Many countries have a system where people throw away their trash and it gets collected by the government. But this system is not perfect. If people don't have to pay for throwing away their trash, they might throw away more than they need to. This can cause problems because it costs money to collect and get rid of the trash.
Some cities have tried to solve this problem by making people pay for each bag of trash they throw away. This is called a "pay-as-you-throw" system. The idea is that if people have to pay for their trash, they will throw away less and recycle more.
Researchers in the United States studied a city called Charlottesville, Virginia, which started a pay-as-you-throw system. They found that people did throw away less trash, but not as much as they thought they would. Some people even started throwing away more trash because they were trying to fit more into each bag. This made the problem worse.
The researchers also found that some people started dumping their trash in other places instead of paying for it to be taken away. This is not good for the environment.
The only good thing that happened was that people started recycling more. But the researchers think that this was because they were already recycling a lot before the pay-as-you-throw system started, not because of the system itself.
Overall, the results of the pay-as-you-throw system were not as good as expected. It's clear that making people pay for their trash can work, but it's not a simple solution.

Work is important, but it's not just about being good at your job. Many people feel unhappy and unfulfilled at work. They feel like they're just doing a job, not enjoying it. This is because work is often about making money, not about being happy or fulfilled.
The author, Theodore Zeldin, wants to change this. He thinks that work should be a way to make us happy and fulfilled, not just a way to make money. He wants to know how work can be changed to make people feel good about themselves, their minds, and their relationships.
The author looks at different jobs and sees that many people are unhappy, even in well-paid jobs. Doctors are stressed, accountants worry about ethics, and architects are not allowed to use their imagination. The author thinks that work should be a way to use our talents and skills, not just a way to earn money.
The author also looks at hotels and sees that many hotel workers are unhappy. They have low salaries and long hours, and are not treated as individuals. The author thinks that hotels could be more than just places to sleep - they could be cultural centers where people from different countries meet and learn from each other.
The author believes that work is a relationship between people, not just a job. He thinks that people should be able to design their own jobs, choose their own colleagues, and have conversations with people from different backgrounds. This would make work more enjoyable and fulfilling.
The author concludes that we need to rethink what work means and how it makes us feel. We need to focus on being happy and fulfilled, not just making money.

"BROADCASTING: How Technology Was Shaped by Society
The word 'broadcasting' comes from an old idea of sowing seeds widely. It's not just an agricultural metaphor, but also a symbol of optimism and growth. It means spreading something to many people, with the hope of getting a good result. The idea of broadcasting assumes that there is a central place where things are sent out from, like a big seed bank. This idea is surprising because a new technology that sends words and pictures through the air was set up in a way that fit with this idea. This technology, called television, was meant to be a big medium that sends information to many people at the same time.
Television is related to other two-way communication technologies like the telephone and telegraph. It's strange that television was designed to be a centralised medium from the start. This is because it fit with the way society and economy were organized at the time. There were some experiments with different ways of organizing television, but they didn't work out.
In the 1930s, some people in Britain tried to make television a two-way communication tool, like a phone. They built their own TV transmitters and receivers, and many people joined in. However, big businesses and the government didn't want this to happen, so they created rules that stopped it.
Television was also used as a way to show movies and plays in public places, especially in the United States. This was seen as a way to compete with the film industry. In many countries, people watched TV in public places, not at home. This was especially true in Germany.
There were some ideas about making TV a more democratic and equal medium, but these ideas didn't work out. The main goal was to make TV a way to reach many people at home, and this is what happened. As people's living standards improved, they started to buy TVs for their homes. This is now happening all over the world.
There is a connection between how society changes and how TV is organized. As society becomes more modern and centralized, TV becomes more centralized too. TV is also a way for governments to reach many people with important information. It's also a way to create a sense of community and national identity. The way TV is organized is closely tied to the way society is organized."

Advertising is everywhere - on billboards, TV, radio, newspapers, and the internet. It tries to make us buy things we don't need. But we can try to be aware of it and not let it control us.

People have been studying caves for a long time, and some people even visit them for fun. Because it's hard to get to some caves, scientists and hobbyists work together to learn about them.
Weather forecasting used to be simple, but now it's a complicated science. We have satellites and computers that give us weather information quickly. But even with all the technology, human observation is still important. People can notice things that computers can't, and this helps scientists make better weather forecasts.

'Music and Theatre: A New Perspective
I used to think that opera is mainly about theatre. But after working at a national opera house, I realized that music is actually more important. This makes sense, but as someone who comes from a theatre background, I find it hard to adjust.
When I go to a concert or opera, I notice that some people don't know much about music. They might feel embarrassed or overwhelmed by the complexity of the music. Others are amazed by the skill of the performers. Even a good musician has spent years practicing to get to that level.
In contrast, theatre audiences have different expectations. They don't always understand how actors learn their lines or appreciate the hard work that goes into a performance. But this doesn't mean they are less appreciative. In fact, audiences and performers connect on a more equal level in the theatre.
I think music could learn from theatre about this connection. Music performances can be very formal, with strict rules and a big gap between the performers and the audience. This can make the experience feel hierarchical and uncomfortable. Sometimes, people applaud between movements or after a difficult piece, which can disrupt the flow of the performance.
There are many efforts to make music more accessible and break down barriers. I remember a special event where a community opera was performed in a cathedral and then in the town. It was amazing, and the audience was involved and engaged.
What I would like to see in music is more experimentation and creativity, like in theatre. Sometimes, this means performing in unusual locations or taking risks. This can be challenging, but it can also be very rewarding.
As someone who loves both theatre and music, I want to see both thrive and for more people to enjoy them. I believe that music can learn from theatre and become more engaging and enjoyable for everyone.'

It blows in your face, gets in your food, and can even swallow small things like keys and coins. When you're wet, it sticks to you like glue and is hard to get off. But when you sit down or step on a towel, it falls off. Sand can stay with you for a long time, even after you've cleaned it off.

A new electronic lock was invented, but it still has a metal key. This is because people feel safer with a physical key.

The museum tried to help visitors understand the art by giving them information about each piece. This helped me understand what the art was trying to say.

Making movies is like telling a story. You need to make some changes to the story to make it work for the screen. This can be hard for writers, but it can also be interesting. I worked on a script and I was surprised by how much of the dialogue and description I could leave out and still get the same message across. This doesn't mean that the original dialogue and description were not important. It's just that different media need different things. In a book, you can use more words to help the reader understand. In a movie, you need to show and not tell.
Watching movies is a special experience. You can get lost in the story and forget about your everyday life. But when the movie is over, you go back to reality. Some people don't think movies are a real art form. They just see them as entertainment. But movies can be a way to tell important stories and make people think.
The film studios are like a big building with many rooms. It's hard to find your way around. But people who work there know where everything is. They make movies that take people on adventures and make them forget their problems.
Many people want to make movies. They buy books about how to do it and take classes. Some people even make movies with small cameras and make a lot of money. But it's not always easy. In the past, movie makers had to work for a long time before they could make their own movies. Now, with the help of technology, anyone can make a movie.

In the past, the houses in our neighborhood were all lined up. They were made of orange bricks or white stucco and looked a bit dirty. In the summer, the smell of chemicals from a nearby factory would spread and make the air smell bad. Many mornings, I would see a boy delivering newspapers wrinkling his nose in disgust as he walked down the street.
I don't remember much from my early childhood, but I do remember sitting by a window and looking at the houses going away into the distance. Later, I remember seeing my mother doing laundry in the back room of a house that wasn't ours. My mother was a small, strict woman who was often angry. I never understood why she was angry, and I couldn't make her happy.
My mother was very particular about how we behaved. She would tell me to behave properly and not to touch other people's flowers or gardens. She would also make me sit quietly for a long time, listening to the radio, with my hands folded across my chest. There were many things she didn't want me to do.
As I grew older, I met some of my mother's friends. They were not very friendly and would talk about boring things like the weather and how mean some people were. I felt like I didn't fit in with them.
Growing up in our neighborhood was predictable. Until I was five, I would stay at home and play with toys. Then, I would go to school, which was a short walk away. My mother would sometimes take me to the museum on Sundays. We would walk around and look at paintings. My mother wasn't always happy, but sometimes she would make a joke.

Charles Darwin thought that people cry for no good reason. But scientists have found that crying is important for people's social relationships. A scientist named John Bowlby said that crying helps babies and their mothers become close. Many people think that children cry because they are helpless. But why do adults still cry? It's not just the sound of crying that matters, but also how it looks. Crying might have helped our ancestors in the past to feel safe and connected with others. We might cry to show sympathy for someone who is suffering. We might also cry when we hear something sad or beautiful, like music or a speech. We might cry when we watch a sad movie, especially when we're with someone else. It seems that crying helps us connect with others, but scientists are still studying why we cry.

The Earth is getting warmer. This is called global warming. We know it's happening, but we're not sure how much warmer it will get or how it will affect our lives. A warmer climate means changes to the weather all over the world. This will have big effects on plants, animals, water, and soil.
We use natural resources to live, like food, cities, and homes. If these resources change, it will affect us. We don't know exactly how the world will change or what's causing it. We know that human actions have increased the amount of certain gases in the air, which are related to temperature. These gases are building up and might already be affecting the climate.
Scientists use computers to predict what will happen when the Earth gets warmer. They use laws of physics and chemistry to analyze the interaction of temperature, pressure, and other factors. However, these predictions are not exact and are slow and expensive to make.
Most people agree that the rate of change will be faster than anything we've experienced before. The predictions suggest that the Earth will get warmer by 1-3.5Â°C by 2100, and sea levels will rise by 15-95 cm. There will be more extreme weather events like heatwaves, floods, and droughts.
Climate change can affect where plants and animals live, the mix of species, and the benefits they provide to humans. This includes food production, water resources, and human settlements. Some areas will be affected negatively, while others might benefit. For example, in Australia, warmer temperatures have led to increased wheat production.
However, many predicted effects of climate change will be negative. Small changes can affect water availability, leading to droughts and water shortages. This will be a problem in arid and semi-arid regions and areas with already high demand or pollution.
The Mediterranean Basin is an example of this, with decreasing precipitation and changes in seasonality. Another effect will be changes to glaciers, which will impact vegetation, wildlife habitats, and human structures.
The most dramatic effect will be the rise in sea levels. This will be caused by the expansion of the ocean and melting ice. Half of the world's population lives in coastal areas, which will be affected by flooding and inundation. This could lead to millions of environmental refugees.
The consequences will be severe, especially for small, low-lying island states, which could cease to exist if worst-case scenarios are realized.

'Wanted: a couple for a long trip to Mars. The trip will last 501 days. The couple must be healthy and strong. They will be the first people to go to Mars if a rich man named Dennis Tito's plan works. His plan is to send a special capsule to space on January 5, 2018. The capsule will go to about 160 km above Mars. The spacecraft will use Mars' gravity to come back to Earth without using too much fuel. This is important because it will save fuel. The next time Mars and Earth are in the right position is in 2031, but Dennis Tito wants to do it sooner. If everything goes well, the spacecraft might make it. Even if it doesn't, the work they do will help make future trips to space better.'

Art is often difficult to understand because people think about it in the wrong way. They think of art as just the painting, book, or statue itself, rather than what it does to people. This makes it hard to understand why people like certain art. 
Art is often seen as something special and separate from everyday life. But art is actually a part of our everyday experiences. It's like a mountain - it's not just a big rock, it's a part of the earth. 
To understand art, we need to think about how it affects us and how it is connected to our daily lives. We can't just look at a painting and say it's beautiful without thinking about why it makes us feel a certain way. 
Many people enjoy things that they don't think of as art, like movies, music, and comics. This is because they find enjoyment in the everyday things they do. But some people think that art should only be in museums and galleries, and that's not true. Art can be found in many things we do every day.
The key is to understand that art is a part of our daily lives and to think about how it affects us. This will help us appreciate art more and understand why we like certain things.

The king didn't want to buy the books, so the woman burned some of them. The king eventually bought the remaining books. I learned that sometimes you need to be clever and patient to get what you want.

The person who decides whether to publish your book will think about whether your book is good and if you are a good writer. They will also think about how easy it will be to sell your book.

Advertising is a tough business. In the early 1990s, it was especially difficult. Many companies were struggling financially, and this made it hard for advertising agencies to do their jobs. People who work in advertising felt under a lot of pressure. They had to come up with good ideas for advertisements with smaller budgets. They also had to work closely with their bosses and colleagues to make sure the advertisements were successful.
At the same time, companies were starting to realize the importance of marketing. They wanted to make sure they were producing products that people wanted to buy, not just things they could easily sell. This made marketing people more important, but it also added to their workload.
The economic situation was not the only challenge. There were other factors that made it difficult to create effective advertisements. For example, there were changes in the way people lived and shopped, and new rules about what could be advertised.
Many people in the advertising industry were struggling to make their advertisements work. They had to find new ways to do more with less. Some companies were successful, but they didn't always share their secrets. This meant that there was not much information available to help people who wanted to improve their advertising skills.

When I was at university, I decided I wanted to be a chef. Not many of my friends wanted to be a chef because it's a hard job with long hours, high pressure, and not much money. But I didn't care. I was unhappy at university. The work was hard, and the social scene was boring. I thought being a chef would be a good change.
I had my first taste of cooking at a famous restaurant in London. The food was amazing! I felt happy and full for days after. After that, I wanted to learn more about cooking. I started reading cookbooks, going to markets, and making big meals. My university studies became less important to me.
I also learned how to dive. My instructor was strict and told me to do things a certain way. At first, I was scared, but I kept trying. When I finally jumped off the diving board, I felt free and happy.
Some people are adventurers who like to travel and take risks. They might climb mountains, sail across the ocean, or eat strange foods. We might think they're strange, but they're just living their lives. We can't understand their world, but we can appreciate their bravery.
I'm a writer who likes to sail. I'm not a great sailor, but I like to write about my sailing adventures. I have a special device on my boat that helps me find my way. But I also like to use old-fashioned ways to navigate, like looking at the waves and feeling the wind. This makes me feel connected to the sea.

Summer is a great time to go on holiday and read books. We can escape from our daily routine and feel more connected to the world. Books help us understand that we are not alone in our thoughts and feelings. They can make us feel happy, sad, or excited, just like we do when we travel.
When we travel, we meet new people and see new things. Our eyes are open to the world in a way that we don't experience at home. We notice the little things, like the colors of the sky, the way people smile, or the beauty of nature. Reading a great book can have a similar effect. It can make us see the world in a new way and help us understand things we didn't notice before.
I wrote these articles about my travels over many years. I tried to keep them as they were originally written, but I did make a few small changes to make them easier to read. I also corrected some mistakes that were easy to fix.

I wrote about my journey to Transylvania, but I lost my notebook for many years. When I found it again, it helped me remember my trip and write about it. I was lucky to have such a great experience in Transylvania, staying in nice homes and meeting friendly people. I didn't always write in my journal, but I tried to remember the important things that happened.

Fashion has a long history, even though it is often thought to be a modern idea. Many historians of fashion say that fashion has been around for a long time, even before the 19th and 20th centuries. They think that the rise of trade and business in the 16th and 17th centuries was when fashion started to develop.
As people's lives became more complicated, they needed more clothes and ways to decorate themselves. This made the meanings of clothes and decorations more complicated too. Today, it's hard to say what something means just by looking at it.
For example, a man's suit might look the same, but it can mean different things in different places and to different people.

Music in the Future
Music is an important part of our lives. We can listen to music on the radio, TV, and on our phones. We can also play music ourselves. In the past, people used to listen to music more often, but now they don't listen as much. This is because we have many ways to listen to music now.
Music is important for many reasons. It makes us happy, and it helps us to express ourselves. We can listen to music with our friends and family, or we can play music with a group. Music is a big part of our culture and society.
Some people think that music will change in the future. They think that we will listen to different kinds of music and that we will use technology to make music. This means that we might not need to learn how to play an instrument as much. But, music is still important, and we will still need people who can play instruments.
To make music education better, we need to change the way we teach music. We need to make music education more accessible to everyone, not just to a few people who are good at music. We also need to teach people how to work together and how to communicate with each other.
In the future, we will need to work together to make music more important in our lives. We need to tell people how much music means to us and how it makes us feel. We need to work together to make music education better and to make music more accessible to everyone.

Actors often get criticized. Sometimes they talk about their work in interviews and say silly things. But it's hard to talk about acting without giving away secrets. Paul Scofield, a famous actor, said that an actor's work is only interesting when they do it. Talking about it makes it boring. 
A good actor starts from scratch with each new play. They learn and grow with the characters and the writer. When the play is over, they feel empty until the next one. 
Adrian Lester played Hamlet well. He was good at controlling his emotions and using his voice. He made the audience feel like he was a real person. 
Acting is about bringing characters to life. It's not just about imitating them. It's about finding the right emotions and movements. 
One director has a special way of rehearsing. They call it "dropping in". The actors sit quietly and listen to the script. When it's their turn to speak, they think about what it means and find the reason to say the words. 
The perfect theatre makes you feel like you're part of the performance. The staff should feel like they're part of it too. The theatre should be designed so that the audience can feel connected to the performers. 
It's hard to make a play that everyone will like. You can't guess what people want to see. When you go to the theatre, you want to be surprised.

For Paul Simon, listening to this new kind of music was exciting and important. He heard it on a radio show called Moondog Rock'n'Roll Party. He had seen a TV show about dinosaurs and was imitating it. I asked him what he knew about dinosaurs, but he didn't know much. Some people think that learning from screens is good, but others think it's not as good as learning from books.
There is a big difference between TV and books. TV is like a movie, it shows us things, but we don't really learn much from it. Books, on the other hand, help us learn by telling us stories and giving us information. We need to learn from people who know more than us, like teachers or parents.
Hollywood is a place in the United States where many movies are made. It used to be a small town, but now it's very famous. People who make movies go there to try to be successful. They talk about their movies and who is making the most money.

Some people didn't think photography was an art, but the photographers knew it was a new way to express themselves.

**Blogging: Sharing with the World**
Some time ago, a website warned people about sharing their location online. The website said that even if you think you're just telling your friends where you are, you're also telling many other people, not all of whom you might want to meet. This shows that there can be a downside to sharing everything online.
We love sharing our lives on the internet. We can share our thoughts, photos, and stories with anyone in the world. But sometimes we forget that our online life is connected to our real life. What we say online can affect our real life, sometimes in bad ways.
A long time ago, some brave people started sharing their lives online. They were the first bloggers. They wrote about their lives, good and bad, and shared photos and art. They showed us that it's possible to be honest and open online.
One blogger, Justin Hall, started sharing his life online in 1994. He wrote about his thoughts, feelings, and experiences. He even shared photos and art. People loved reading about him, but sometimes his honesty got him into trouble.
Another blogger, Heather Armstrong, wrote about her job and her life. But one day, her boss found out about her blog and she lost her job. This happened because people often feel like they can say things online that they wouldn't say in person. But our online life is connected to our real life, and what we say online can affect our real life.
Heather learned an important lesson. She realized that just because we can share anything online doesn't mean we should. She started writing about her new family and became a successful blogger. She learned to be careful about what she shares online.
We can learn from Heather's story. We should be careful about what we share online and think about how it might affect our real life.

Here is a simplified version of the reading passage for an A2 level learner:
Sleep is a big problem for many people. In the past, people didn't get enough sleep because they had to work long hours. Now, with more free time, people have more time to sleep, but many still don't get enough. In fact, research shows that 40 million Americans have trouble sleeping.
Some scientists are studying sleep to find out why we need it. They think that sleep helps our bodies repair themselves and helps us think clearly. They also think that women sleep for longer than men and that older people need less sleep.
But what is sleep for? Some scientists think that sleep is a way to travel through time without getting hurt. Others think that sleep is just a way to rest our bodies and minds.
In the past, people slept differently. They would sleep for a few hours, wake up, and then sleep again. This was because they had to work during the day and didn't have much time to sleep. Now, most people sleep all night and wake up in the morning.
Some cultures still sleep differently. In some places, people go to bed for a few hours and then wake up to watch the fire or protect themselves from animals. In other places, people don't have a fixed bedtime and sleep when they feel tired.
Overall, sleep is important for our bodies and minds. We need to make sure we get enough sleep to stay healthy and happy.

I wore big, expensive cowboy boots in the Arizona desert. I wanted to be a cowboy, but I wasn't. I didn't know how to be one. I looked at the mountains and felt out of place. I had a special time in my life when I didn't have a summer for nine years. I went to New Zealand every summer, which is their winter. My parents wanted to buy a small piece of land for my brother, sister, and me to take care of. They said, "If you can take the time and effort to plant trees, you can have it." The idea was that we would always have a connection to New Zealand, because my father grew up there.
I was very excited to plant trees. I had worked on farms in Australia before, so I knew it would be hard work. But I liked it. My family and I planted the 70 acres of land over four years. It was a lot of work, especially because it rained a lot. But it was also very happy times. We would get ready for the next planting session every morning, getting wet and cold. It was a special feeling.
I had a friend who helped me plant trees, which was very helpful because I had never done it before. We would fill our bags with as many trees as we could and then plant them along a line. It was hard to get the lines straight, but once we did, it was easy. I enjoyed the physical work and got very fit.
As I planted trees, I started to think about the natural world and our place in it. This thinking has continued to influence my life. I've gone back to New Zealand four times to see how the trees are growing, and it's been very satisfying. I'm proud of what we accomplished.
Sometimes I worry about the news stories about bad weather in New Zealand, but so far, the trees are doing well. I even wrote a book about my experience, called Seeing Green. I spent three months on the tree farm, writing in the mornings, pruning trees in the afternoons, and doing research in the evenings. The connection I have with that place is very strong. It's a special bond between people and the earth.

**Taking Care of Baby Badgers**
My husband and I run a farm in Somerset where we take care of orphaned animals. One day, some helpers brought us three baby badgers. They were very small, about 8 inches long, and had soft, grey fur and white and black stripes on their heads. We had never seen baby badgers before, as they usually live underground and die if they are orphaned.
The mother badger had been killed, and the babies were cold and hungry. We fed them with a special bottle and kept them warm by the stove. We named them Primrose, Bluebell, and Willow. At first, we had to help them go to the bathroom by wiping them with a warm cloth, just like a mother badger would do. After a few days, they started eating and drinking on their own.
Willow, one of the cubs, got sick and died. We were very sad. But then, a local farmer brought us another baby badger, and we named him Willow II. He was a bit smaller and harder to feed than the others. It took some time, but eventually, he learned to eat solid food.
As the cubs grew, they started to play and explore. They loved to chase each other and play in the long grass. We would join in and play with them too. But we had to be careful not to get too close, or they would nip us.
As the summer got hotter and it was harder to find food, the cubs started to go out at night to hunt for worms and other insects. We would go with them and watch them play. They would curl up together in their new home, a special underground sett we built for them.
Now, the cubs are grown and have their own territory. We still see them sometimes, but they are mostly nocturnal, so we don't see them as often during the day. We are happy that we could give them a good home and help them grow up strong and healthy.

Every summer, peacocks at Whipsnade Wild Animal Park show off their beautiful tails to the hens. But how did they get such a fancy feature? Zoologist Marion Petrie and her team are trying to find out. They think that peacocks' tails might be a sign of good health or a good mate. A long time ago, a scientist named Charles Darwin thought that peacocks' tails were a waste of space. He believed that animals evolved to survive and reproduce, and that the ones with the best features would have more babies. But another scientist, Alfred Russel Wallace, thought that peacocks' tails might be important for something else. He believed that hens chose the males with the most impressive tails because they knew something that humans didn't.
To solve this mystery, Petrie and her team are studying the peacocks at Whipsnade. They want to know if hens really do prefer the males with the most impressive tails and if these males have any other good qualities. They have been watching the peacocks for a long time and taking pictures. They found that hens do like the males with the most eye-spots on their tails. But they still don't know if these males are also healthier or better in other ways.
One scientist, William Hamilton, thinks that showy birds are often healthier than others. Petrie and her team are trying to find out if this is true for peacocks. They are comparing the babies of the males that hens like with the babies of the males that hens don't like. If the babies of the liked males are healthier, then it means that hens are choosing the right males.
There is one more interesting idea. A mathematician named R A Fisher thought that maybe hens started liking the males with longer tails because they saw something good in them. The sons of these males would inherit their fathers' long tails, and the daughters would like long tails too. This would create a cycle where the males with the longest tails would have more babies, and the hens would keep liking them. This could be why peacocks have such long tails.

We are very similar to chimpanzees, and we haven't changed much in the past seven million years. We are almost 98% identical to them. This means that any differences between humans and animals must be very recent. Scientists think that our ability to make art and other things that make us unique must come from a small number of genes.
But, surprisingly, animals are also able to do things that we thought were unique to humans. For example, chimpanzees use sticks to eat and to defend themselves, and sea otters use rocks to open shells. Some animals even have their own language, like monkeys who make different sounds to warn each other about dangers.
We used to think that art was something that only humans could do, but now we know that animals can create art too. For example, chimpanzees have been known to paint and make music. They do it for their own pleasure, not for a practical reason.
We used to think that human art was different because it is not useful, but animals also create art that is not useful. We also thought that human art was different because it is made for aesthetic pleasure, but animals may also enjoy the way their art looks or sounds. Finally, we thought that human art was different because it is learned, but animals can also learn to make art.
In fact, there is a famous story about two chimpanzees named Congo and Betsy who created paintings that were shown in an art museum. People bought some of their paintings, and they were very good at making art.
So, it seems that the differences between human art and animal art are not as big as we thought. Both humans and animals can create art for pleasure, and both can learn to make art.

People sleep for about a third of their lives. It's clear that sleep is important, but what it's for is still a mystery. Scientists don't agree on why we sleep so much. There are three main ideas about this. One idea is that our body needs sleep to stay healthy. It's like our body is fixing any damage we did during the day while we sleep. Another idea is that sleep helps us learn new things. Without sleep, we wouldn't be able to remember what we learned during the day. The third idea is that sleep helps us have energy for the next day. It's like our body is recharging its batteries while we sleep.

What is an eccentric? An eccentric is someone who does things differently from what is normal. But what is normal? We all have our own quirks and things that make us unique. Maybe you like to collect stamps or write letters to the newspaper. Being eccentric is about being yourself and doing what you want, even if others don't understand.
Most of us have two sides to our personality. One side wants to fit in and be like everyone else, and the other side wants to be different and stand out. It's like two trains going in opposite directions. In most people, the side that wants to fit in is stronger. We all want to be accepted and liked by others.
People who are different often find each other and join groups or clubs to talk about their interests. They want to be with others who understand them. A crowd can be comforting, even if it's just a small group.
We all have a balance between being ourselves and fitting in. We might feel like we're being like everyone else, but deep down, we want to be different. We might even pretend to be different to feel special. But true eccentrics are not trying to be different, they just are.
For example, a famous singer like Bob Dylan is known for being himself and doing what he wants. He didn't try to be different, he just is. Real eccentrics are not trying to get attention or make a point, they just do what feels natural to them.
In contrast, some people do things to get attention or to rebel against society. They are aware of what others think and do things to make a statement. Eccentrics are not like this. They are not thinking about what others think, they just do what they want because it's who they are.

Volunteer Tourism
Some people travel to other countries to help with projects, like building homes or schools. But is this really helping? The people who organize these trips often charge a lot of money for the experience. This means that the money could be used to pay for more workers to do the same work. This is especially true for "gap year" travelers who don't have special skills or experience.
Some people think that these trips might not be truly helping others. Instead, they might be just a way for young people to gain "cultural capital" that will help them in their future careers. However, these projects can also help people develop good values and a sense of responsibility.
Volunteer tourism can also bring people together and help them understand each other better. This can lead to more peaceful and democratic societies. It can also create networks of people who care about global issues.
But there are also problems with volunteer tourism. It can be like colonialism, where wealthy people from rich countries try to help poor countries without really understanding their problems. It can also be just a way for wealthy people to feel good about themselves, without really making a difference.
Volunteer tourism can be a good thing if it's done the right way. It can help people learn new skills and understand different cultures. But it's important to remember that it's not just about individual acts of charity. We need to think about the bigger issues that cause poverty and inequality in the world.

I met Picasso when I was 18 years old. I was traveling around Europe and Morocco with a friend. We didn't have much money, so I got a job painting boats on the waterfront in Cannes. One day, I saw Picasso eating lunch at a restaurant near the water. He was with his wife and some friends. I was surprised because Picasso was known to be a private person who liked to stay away from people.
I was carrying a sketchbook and decided to go over and ask for his autograph. He agreed, and then he drew a line on the paper. It was an unusual drawing, but it might have been inspired by the sea or the clouds.
After that, I started talking to Picasso, and we used a translator to communicate because he didn't speak much English. I told him about my love for art and my admiration for his work. He was very kind and friendly.
My friend told me to go back and draw a portrait of Picasso. I was a bit nervous, but I decided to try. Picasso started acting silly, making funny faces and poses. He was like a clown! I tried to draw him, but it was difficult because he was being so playful.
Finally, he stopped acting and let me draw him for a few minutes. I noticed that he was still very energetic and strong, even though he was 84 years old. His eyes were very intense and interesting.
After I finished drawing, Picasso wanted to see my portrait. I was a bit embarrassed, but he said it was okay. Then he took the crayon and drew a portrait of me. It was very different from mine, and I was surprised. He moved his eye to my nose and drew a line to represent my smile.
I thanked Picasso and asked him to sign the drawing. He said I already had his signature, so he wouldn't sign it again. I was grateful for the experience and felt lucky to have met Picasso.

**Selling Tricks in Shops**
Have you ever gone to a store and bought more things than you planned? Shops use different tricks to make us spend money. Here are some of them:
**Fresh and Nice Smells**
Supermarkets put fresh fruit and vegetables near the entrance to make the store look nice and fresh. They also use a bakery to make the smell of freshly baked bread fill the store.
**Where to Put Things**
Shops put important products in easy-to-see places. They use computers to see which products sell the most and put them in those areas. They also put special offers in places where people are likely to see them.
**Making You Buy More**
Some shops put low-priced items far away from the entrance. This makes you walk past other products that are more expensive. They also put products they want to sell quickly in places that are easy to see.
**Making Things Look Good**
Some shops make their products look special by using nice packaging or displays. They also use green or other colors that make things look fresh and healthy.
**Pricing and Lighting**
Shops care about the prices of their products and how they look under the lighting. They want to make sure you can see the colors of the products clearly.
**Making You Walk Around**
Some shops divide their stores into different areas with different carpets. This makes you walk along a certain path and see other products along the way.
**Advertising**
Some shops use big pictures or videos to advertise their products. They also use special trolleys with screens to show you ads as you shop.
These are just a few tricks that shops use to make us spend more money. Next time you go shopping, see if you can spot any of these tricks!

Apples have been around for thousands of years. People have eaten them since ancient times. They even grew apples in prehistoric times! 
In the past, people didn't have many varieties of apples like we do today. They mostly ate wild apples, which were small and not very sweet. 
The Romans taught the French how to grow apples. They brought apples to Britain and introduced new varieties. The British monks experimented with apples and created new types. 
In the Middle Ages, people in Britain grew many different kinds of apples. One popular apple was called the Pearmain, which was shaped like a pear. Another was the Costard, which was used for cooking. 
In the 16th century, Henry VIII wanted to learn about apple cultivation from the French. He sent a man named Richard Harris to France, and Harris brought back new apple varieties, including the famous Pippins. 
People took apples with them when they traveled to new countries. For example, the Pilgrim Fathers took apples to America. 
In the 19th century, a man named Johnny Appleseed planted apple seeds in North America. He was very kind and loved animals. 
In the 20th century, people discovered new apple varieties, like the Delicious and the Granny Smith. 
Now, apples are grown all over the world. But many apple varieties are disappearing because people prefer a few popular types. We need to protect the diversity of apples and other foods.

Advertising is not doing well. It's not just because of the economic crisis. The problem is that advertising hasn't kept up with changes in the economy. Advertisers think in terms of big groups of people and big media, but now there are many smaller groups and many different media. As a result, advertisements often don't reach the right people.
Think about your own shopping habits. When you go to a supermarket, you might buy 30-50 things. But most of these won't be advertised brands. You might buy a few advertised brands, but not many. In a year, you might buy around 400 different brands. Compare this to the 32,500 brands that are advertised. Most people don't buy most of these brands.
When you watch TV, you might see 1 in 16 commercials that are for brands you buy or might buy. The other 15 commercials are wasted. You might think you're special and immune to advertising, but you're not. Most people think the same, but it's not true. Most people don't buy most of the brands they see advertised.
Advertising has to reach a lot of people to reach the right people. It's like trying to find a needle in a haystack. Even with direct mail, which is more targeted, not everyone will respond. With media advertising, you can't know exactly who will respond.
The best way to make advertising more effective is to target the right people more closely. This is true for all kinds of advertising, not just products. Any campaign that can win over 2% of the population is very successful. The most effective way to reach this 2% might be through mass media, but advertising needs to be more targeted than ever before.

Arthur Conan Doyle, the writer of the Sherlock Holmes stories, was a logical person. But in 1920, he saw some pictures of fairies in a garden and thought they were real. He wrote an article and published the pictures, saying that fairies are magical. It was only in 1939 that the two women who took the pictures admitted that they were fake. They cut out fairy pictures from a book and put them in the garden. The pictures are very nice, but the trick shows that the camera is not always honest. We can now use computer software to change our digital pictures, and it's not true that photography was ever completely honest. From the start, cameras changed what we saw.

I STOPPED SMOKING I thought everyone would be happy, but one of my friends was very upset. 'Why did you stop now?' she asked. I didn't know how to explain it. Science is not just about complicated ideas; it is also about the people who do the work. Margaret Wilkins has a special skill. She can find water underground using a special stick. She holds the stick above the ground and can feel when there is water below. This skill is very useful for farmers who have dry wells. Margaret and her husband run a business drilling wells, but they use her special skill to find the water first.
Many people don't understand how Margaret does it, but she says it's like a special feeling in her body. She thinks that everything on Earth vibrates, and she can feel these vibrations. Some people think she can smell the water, but Margaret says it's not that.
Margaret's customers are mostly farmers who need water for their farms. She tries to find the water between 50 and 70 meters deep. She has to be careful not to find water that might be dirty or have bad things in it. She also needs to find a place where it's easy to get electricity to run the pump.
To find the water, Margaret uses a map and a special tool called a pendulum. She moves the pendulum over the map to find where the water might be. Then, she walks over the fields with her special stick and feels when she is above the water. She uses the stick to find the exact spot to drill the well.
Margaret's husband also uses the stick, and they usually agree on where to drill. If they don't agree, they keep looking until they do. Margaret's special skill is not just her, and many people have studied it. She calls it an "intuitive perception of the environment". It's what helps her find water so accurately.

**Motivate Yourself to Lead**
What makes a good leader? A leader is someone who inspires others and helps them to achieve their goals. It's not about being tall or smart, but about being enthusiastic and motivating others.
A good leader should be able to speak clearly and confidently. They should also be able to make things happen by working with others who are enthusiastic and interested.
Many people have the potential to be leaders, but they may not realize it. To become a leader, you need to recognize your talents, develop them, and use them.
A good leader is someone who motivates and supports their team. They help their team members to feel important and give them the information they need to succeed.
Leaders and managers are different. Managers follow rules, while leaders create their own path. A good manager can keep a company running smoothly, but a good leader can make a big difference and transform an organization.
Whether you're the boss or a team leader, you can improve your leadership skills. Here are some tips:
* Find what you're passionate about and lead with enthusiasm.
* Think of yourself as a leader and recognize your abilities.
* Be willing to take risks and learn from your mistakes.
* Learn how to delegate and motivate others.
* Practice your communication skills and be open to feedback.
* Be visible and accessible to your team, but also know when to step back and let others lead.
Remember, leadership is not just about being in charge, it's about making a positive impact on others.

**Photographing People**
Taking pictures of people is the most interesting thing to do. A photo with someone in it is usually more exciting than a photo without a person. But taking good photos of people is hard. You need to think about their actions, gestures, and expressions. And sometimes the camera can make them feel uncomfortable.
**Taking Group Photos**
When taking a group photo, try not to line everyone up in a straight line. Ask them to stand at different angles and distances. You can also have some people sit or kneel in front to make it easier to see everyone's faces.
**Posing for Photos**
People often don't act naturally when taking a photo. They might look stiff and unnatural. To relax them, suggest they find a comfortable position. You can ask them to fold their arms or put their hands in their pockets.
**Getting Good Shots**
Don't pretend you're not taking a photo when you are. This can make people feel uncomfortable. Most people are happy to have their photo taken and might even be flattered. But they might feel self-conscious, so you might need to guide them.
**Eye Contact**
A photo is more interesting if the person is looking directly at the camera. Ask them to look at the lens, not just smile. This can be hard for them to do for a long time, so remind them just before you take the photo.
**Candid Shots**
Instead of looking directly at the camera, the person can focus on something in the photo. This can be a good way to get a more natural shot. The viewer will follow their attention to another part of the photo.
**Expressions and Gestures**
Expressions and gestures can tell us a lot about the person in the photo. A happy child can make us smile, while a sad expression can make us feel sorry for them. Look for familiar expressions like shrugs, winks, or anger.
**Background and Situation**
The background or situation can add interest to a photo. Try to exclude things that are not important to the subject. Make sure the subject is not overwhelmed by the background.
**Interaction**
Photos of people interacting with each other can be interesting. This can be couples, friends, family, or people working or playing together. Look for contact between them, like eye contact or physical touch.
**People and Places**
Many photos are taken on holiday or during an outing. To make these photos better, use a standard or wide-angle lens and stand back to get the whole scene in the frame. Ask the people to come close to the camera and compose the photo so the group is in the foreground and the background is visible.
**To Pose or Not to Pose?**
Think about why you want to take the photo. If you want a good clear photo to remember someone, it's okay to ask them to pose. But if you're taking a photo of family or friends, candid shots are often better. They can be more lively and natural.

Acupuncture is an old Chinese treatment that is over 2,000 years old. It is part of traditional Chinese medicine, which also includes herbal medicine, massage, diet, and exercise. Acupuncture is used to help with many different health problems, but it is most commonly used to relieve pain.
Traditional Chinese medicine believes that health is when the body, mind, and spirit are in balance. It says that there is a special energy called Qi that flows through the body along special lines called meridians. When the flow of Qi is blocked or weak, the body can become unbalanced and people may feel sick.
When a traditional acupuncturist sees a patient, they will feel the patient's pulse, look at their tongue, and ask about their medical history, eating habits, and how they feel. They will then insert fine needles into the skin to help restore the flow of Qi. The needles may also be warmed with herbs or pressed to help stimulate the flow of Qi.
There are over 300 points on the body where acupuncture can be used. People often feel a mild ache or tingling sensation when the needle is inserted, which shows that the needle has reached the Qi.
Doctors in the West have studied acupuncture and found that it can be effective for pain relief. They have also found that it may work by blocking pain signals to the brain or releasing natural pain-relieving chemicals.
Acupuncture can be used to treat many types of pain, including back pain, arthritis, headaches, and migraines. It is often used by people who have chronic pain that does not go away.
In China, acupuncture is used during surgery to help patients feel less pain. It is also used to treat people who are terminally ill. Acupuncturists claim that acupuncture can be used to eliminate pain during surgery, but this can vary from person to person.
Many people find acupuncture helpful, but it may not work for everyone. Acupuncturists say that it usually takes several visits to feel real relief from chronic pain.
Acupuncture is different from Western medicine because it looks at the whole person, not just the symptoms. Acupuncturists want to know what is causing the pain and how it is affecting the person's life.
Some medical professionals have traditional acupuncture training, while others do not believe in traditional Chinese theory. It is important to choose an acupuncturist who is qualified and experienced.
